About

I am a 3rd year student at Ens Paris-Saclay in theoretical computer science. I am currently doing a one year long internship, under the supervision of Benedikt Ahrens at TU Delft in the PL Group.

My main interests are :

  • Type Theory
  • Proof Assistants
  • Functional Programming Languages
  • Categorical Semantics

News

Workshop Formalization of Cohomology Theories

I will participate online to the Workshop Formalization of Cohomology Theories from May 21 to May 26, 2023, organized by the Banff International Research Station.

Distinguished Paper at CPP 2023

Our paper Computing Cohomology Rings in Cubical Agda with Axel Ljungström and Anders Mörtberg, was accepted at CPP 2023 and awarded Distinguished Paper .
